name: GunMeal
description:
Welcome to GunMeal, a singleplayer TDM-style first person shooter developed by Ishmael Games! The first team to reach the winning score wins. Rack up enough kills to earn killstreaks! Be on the lookout for random care packages, too. Beware, the intense firefights and gut-wrenching all-out warfare are not for the faint-hearted! Be sure to have fun! You can also download the zip file here for an enhanced experience!

Controls:

Movement: WASD

Shoot: Left Click

Aim: Right Click

Melee: E

Crouch: C

Jump: Space

Toggle Fire Mode: X

Primary/Secondary Switch: 1 & 2

Grenade: G

Activate AGM missile: Left Arrow

Activate airstrike: Up Arrow

Activate helicopter: Right Arrow

Activate droid: Down Arrow

Pause (Browser) : P

Pause (Client): Esc

Ishmael Games 2022
